spec.name: La Cascade Restaurant
spec.description: La Cascade Restaurant (The Cascade Restaurant) is a dining establishment in Casablanca, often located in the coastal or high-end leisure districts, specializing in a varied **International menu**. Its name might suggest a setting with water features or an expansive, tiered layout. The restaurant provides a sophisticated culinary experience, catering to an audience seeking diverse cuisine and a pleasant, possibly scenic, ambiance.
